title: File lock conflict with TKT-078 on calls-client.tsx
issue: Cannot start implementation of TKT-086 because one of the required files (`apps/dashboard/src/app/(app)/admin/calls/calls-client.tsx`) is currently locked by TKT-078. According to Dev Agent SOP section 3.3, I must stop and report to PM when there's a file lock conflict.
what_i_tried: Attempted to register session with agent-cli.sh
Checked active locks with agent-cli.sh check-locks
Confirmed calls-client.tsx is locked by agent-TKT-078

error_details.stack_trace: Active locks output shows: apps/dashboard/src/app/(app)/admin/calls/calls-client.tsx - locked by TKT-078

suggested_resolution: Wait for TKT-078 to complete and release the lock on calls-client.tsx, then re-run TKT-086. Alternatively, check if TKT-078 can be paused/cancelled if it's stalled, or coordinate with PM to sequence these tickets.

done: Analyzed that ticket spec provides clear architecture direction (API route + hook)
